attributes.action: MP's should vote how their constituents voted in the EU referendum. End Off!
attributes.background: MP's cannot respect the will of the people and the Brexit mess is infuriating the Jo Public - who just want this mess sorting. So to do this the MP's should just vote how each of their respective constituents voted.

rejection.details:
How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could ask your own MP to vote according to the result of referendum in your constituency. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/
